CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Gender__c)), "Gender;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Race__c)), "Race;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Birthdate), "Birthdate;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Language__c)), "Language;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Name__c), "Primary Contact Name;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Phone__c), "Primary Contact Phone;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Emergency_Contact_Name__c), "Emergency Contact Name;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Emergency_Contact_Phone__c), "Emergency Contact Phone;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Name__c), "Service Coordinator Name;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Email__c), "Service Coordinator Email;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Phone__c), "Service Coordinator Phone;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(MailingStreet), 'Street; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(MailingCity), 'City; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode), 'Zip Code; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(MailingState), 'State; ', '') &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Head_of_Household__c)), 'Head Of Household; ', '') & IF(ISNULL(Accessibility_Needs__c), "Accessibility Needs;", "") & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Limited_Mobility__c)), 'Limited Mobility; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Pet_Non_Service_Animal__c)), 'Pet Non Service Animal; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Service_Animal__c)), 'Service Animal; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(Transportation_Method__c), 'Transportation Method; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Would_Consider_Roommate__c)), 'Would Consider Roommate; ', '') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Has_Section_8_Voucher__c)), 'Has Section 8 Voucher; ', '') &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Has_Family_Contact__c)), "Has Family Contact;", "") & IF(AND(TEXT(Has_Family_Contact__c) = "Yes", OR(ISBLANK(Family_Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Family_Contact_Phone__c) )), "Family Contact Name or Phone;", "") &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Paid_Support_Type__c)), "Paid Support Type;", "") & IF(AND(TEXT(Paid_Support_Type__c) <> "No Support", OR(ISBLANK(Paid_Support_Name__c), ISBLANK(Paid_Support_Phone__c), ISBLANK(Paid_Support_Agency__c) )), "Paid Support Name, Agency, or Phone;", "") &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Conserved__c)), "Conserved;", "") & IF(AND(TEXT(Conserved__c) = "Yes", OR(ISBLANK(Conservator_Name__c), ISBLANK(Conservator_Phone__c) )), "Conservator Name or Phone;", "") &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Rep_Payee__c)), "Rep Payee;", "") & IF(AND(TEXT(Rep_Payee__c) = "Yes", OR(ISBLANK(Rep_Payee_Name__c), ISBLANK(Rep_Payee_Phone__c) )), "Rep Payee Name or Phone;", "")
CustomField.label: Essential Fields Missing Basic
